projects.name: PeerPlay
projects.description: Monetize from day 1 with token-gated videos and live streams support. It also supports chat and 1-on-1 video calls, empowering creators like never before.

projects.name: Xstream
projects.description: Xstream is a token-gated Video streaming platform for watching exclusive content of your favourite streamers by minting their NFT and also can chat with these streamers using Push Chat by holding their NFT.

projects.name: DeciStream
projects.description: Decentralized multiplayer streaming platform. Channel subscribers will own NFT to make channel decisions.

projects.name: Chitty chat
projects.description: Meet Chitty Chat, an enhanced Push chat app! A one-stop shop for easy interaction with web3 tools, DataDao management, ChatGPT access, and IPFS file handling.

projects.name: Secret Agent
projects.description: Local application for building AI agents, and collaborating with your team through chat and documents.

projects.name: Career Bro w/ AI
projects.description: AI assistant for building a great resume and getting a dream job.

projects.name: Tribe
projects.description: Tribe is a decentralized community platform which brings the independent content creators and their fans together.

projects.name: Flight
projects.description: A decentralized platform that creates a vibrant community where FPV enthusiasts can connect.

projects.name: Spaces3
projects.description: Spaces3 is an audio conferencing app with token gating, chatting, and video calls.

projects.name: Blockmail
projects.description: Blockmail is a decentralized mail system, where you can send and receive mails using wallet addresses.

projects.name: ZKredentials
projects.description: Decentralized, trustless resume verification for anon devs. Powered by zk-SNARKs.
